channel.title: Worth repainting?
channel.description:
I've had my car for over a year and a half now, done over 30,000km on it. The paint is quite bad and it has got a little rust on the car. I am wondering if it is worth repainting the car (removing rust in the process) in an attempt to keep it alive for another 5 or so years.
It is a 1988 Corolla FX GT with 328100km on the clock - the engine still runs perfectly.
Rust on the firewall - a previous owner bogged that up: [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/809/imga0054.jpg/][IMG]http://img809.imageshack.us/img809/4818/imga0054.jpg[/img][/URL]
Maori paintjob over dent on back corner: [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/141/imga0052.jpg/][IMG]http://img141.imageshack.us/img141/2430/imga0052.jpg[/img][/URL]
Bit of rust above the doors: [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/803/imga0051.jpg/][IMG]http://img803.imageshack.us/img803/8792/imga0051.jpg[/img][/URL]
Clear coat coming off the door: [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/94/imga0050f.jpg/][IMG]http://img94.imageshack.us/img94/1138/imga0050f.jpg[/img][/URL]
General overview of the car (my brother has some rims from another car that will fit this once my tyres are out of tread in about 60,000 km XD.): [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/94/imga0046n.jpg/][IMG]http://img94.imageshack.us/img94/9060/imga0046n.jpg[/img][/URL]
Oh, and that hub cover was cracked when I stole the wheels of my friend's paddock car.

item.title: Worth repainting?
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

spray paint it for street cred mang

Read full topic

item.title: Worth repainting?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“Locke88, post:11, topic:424624”]Is it worth repainting a 1988 240 Volvo wagon to get rid of the alligatoring?
The blue book value for a 1991 is $785. The car runs, fairly well, the inside leather seats have some damage, there are other interior flaws…missing ashtray, etc. What do you think?[/quote][quote=“Moparisthebest, post:5, topic:424624”]It depends on if it is worth it to you or not, it isn’t going to add any value to the car at all, so if you don’t care to drive it around like it is, just don’t paint it.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Worth repainting?
item.dc:creator: @Locke88 Locke88
item.description:
@Locke88 wrote:

Is it worth repainting a 1988 240 Volvo wagon to get rid of the alligatoring?
The blue book value for a 1991 is $785. The car runs, fairly well, the inside leather seats have some damage, there are other interior flaws…missing ashtray, etc. What do you think?

Read full topic

item.title: Worth repainting?
item.dc:creator: @Rodgerwilco Rodgerwilco
item.description:
@Rodgerwilco wrote:

I wouldn’t even waste the time or money to spray paint it with the cheapest paint I could get. You will get another 5 years out of your car… and use it till you blow it out. Saves so much money…

Read full topic

item.title: Worth repainting?
item.dc:creator: @C117 C_
item.description:
@C117 wrote:

Will be wasting a lot of cash for that (about 500 USD) yet Toyota’s are reliable. I suggest you do what mwielbehaus said and just invest for a new car as that will last you for a while longer.

Read full topic

item.title: Worth repainting?
item.dc:creator: @mwiebelhaus mwiebelhaus
item.description:
@mwiebelhaus wrote:

The car is serving you well like most toyotas (reliable) save the money and invest in another new or used reliable vehicle in 5 years but dont worry about painting it because then you will be worrying about where you park, keeping it clean to look nice, and making sure you don’t get scratches in it, its a bitch having a nice car

Read full topic

item.title: Worth repainting?
item.dc:creator: @Phillipe Phillipé
item.description:
@Phillipe wrote:

not a fukken chance is that worth spraying.

Read full topic

item.title: Worth repainting?
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

sure ill paint the image for you for like $100

Read full topic

item.title: Worth repainting?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

It depends on if it is worth it to you or not, it isn’t going to add any value to the car at all, so if you don’t care to drive it around like it is, just don’t paint it.

Read full topic

item.title: Worth repainting?
item.dc:creator: @MujaheD Radeon
item.description:
@MujaheD wrote:

Yeah and also consider how long you expect to own this car for

Read full topic

item.title: Worth repainting?
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

I’d never spend much money on such a car. It’s fine to transport you, and probably more economical than my car, but it will never be more than a cheap way to get from A to B. So spending a crap load on a paint job is pretty pointless. Besides, I doubt it will stay alive another 5 years without you having to spend a few hundred quid. Timing belt etc…

Read full topic

item.title: Worth repainting?
item.dc:creator: @Thebeanie TheBeanie
item.description:
@Thebeanie wrote:

Over here, a professional repaint would probably cost around £1000, judging from the look of the car itle never be worth that much even after the repaint so i would advise against it.

Read full topic
